content: this crochet laptop case is a quick fun and easy project you ll need 1 skein of lionbrand vel-lux yarn in any colour you like you can substitute with any other medium worsted yarn i chose a smaller hook for this yarn to make the case more dense without holes and it turned out amazing i used half_double_crochet yarn under to make the stitch pop more video demo of the stitch is on my blog together with the free pattern and more details patter is easily adjustable to fit any size laptop enjoy
